engine

Class Starter

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Starter

  • public class Starter
extends java.lang.Object
    The engine starter and class to call to run the game
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Crabman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String fileName
      The path to the GameWorld file that will be provided by the main arguments
      private GameWorld game
      The GameWorld object that will be loaded from file
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream objectIn
      The Object Input Stream used to load the GameWorld file
      private static java.lang.String saveGame
      The default save file name, generated from the GameWorld file name

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Starter()
      Loads the game data and sets the Output Stream

      • Starter

        public Starter()
        throws java.io.IOException,
               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads the game data and sets the Output Stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the provided file isn't found or not a GameWorld file
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the provided file isn't a GameWorld file

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        The main method. Runs the Starter and launches the game.
        Parameters:
        args - Path to game file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If no arguments, i.e. no game file path is provided
        java.io.IOException - If the provided file isn't found or not a GameWorld file
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the provided file isn't a GameWorld file

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts the game loop and handles the input and game logic

        Loads the game from file
        Parameters:
        saveGame - The save file name
        Returns:
        Whether load was successful

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String saveGame)
